111332112.content:
one day, Tori was in an old musty thrift shop, tori normally wouldn't go into places like this but Jade dared her to check it out, Tori would have refused but Jade was a really scary person so she decided to go in.

as she was looking around, Tori spotted a full body mirror that was so dusty you couldn't see the reflective surface. Tori then found an old dust rag and decided to wipe it off.

upon finishing, Tori noticed something off about the mirror, for a moment she could have sworn she saw it shimmering. Tori then went to touch the glass to examine it until her hand suddenly went through the glass like it was water, causing Tori to fall forward in surprise entering the mirror.

12111.content:
Carly likes to wear diapers as a result of trying them on for a skit for her show, ICarly. The skit involved her and Sam both wearing diapers and making jokes while in them. It's unknown at this point if Sam likes to wear diapers (but this can easily be changed by you, the reader, of course :) ) , but Carly began to like wearing them after participating in the skit.

For the sake of this choice, let's say that the story starts off the day after the show was aired, with Carly coming home from school and seeing a few extra diapers that were saved from the previous show. Intrigued from the night before, she decides to wear them. What happens after this is up to you and the others who add on, if this is the choice you want to choose.

info.brief_description: Re-creating my Victorious Diaper story, with extra characters.
info.description:
Revising my previous Victorious story, but with the characters of iCarly added as well for more fun.

Rules.
No drugs, sex, religion bashing. Keep gross things in the diapers.
